review: If Verizon FIOS is your internet provider and you use the issued ActionTec router  (MI424WR) you will be unable to set-up the Chromecast. ActionTec routers may not support the multicast protocol, which your network must have to detect your Chromecast.Verizon nor Actiontec provided no support for this product.

review: The Chromecast is easy to install and an excellent addition to the home.  It works with the Chrome browser, so anything on the laptop or tablet can appear on the TV.  It works with YouTube, Netflix and even HBO GO.The only downside compared to my Roku is that the Chromecast is dependent on the laptop, where the Roku is stand alone.
